Html:
For awhile now, actually since I started using Rawr for my Shadow gear (the last 4-5 versions), when I optimize for my Shadow gear, Rawr seems to completely ignore my hit filter.

I go into Tools->Optimize...

Calculate for DPS Rating, with a filter of Hit Rating >= 11.00 % ( I am full specced into lower hit rating)

 

I run it, and follow it's directions, which then drop my Hit to SEVERELY below cap, I'm talking 6%, far below the 11% I've set in the filter.

 

Am I doing it wrong? I've never had to worry about hit in Rawr before, but as I'm needing to run DPS for progression lately now it's a necessity.
If it says Hit Rating, that's Rating not Percent
